attributes.review: I went on thinking nothing much of the app then saw a picture of a Cheeto dressed in a suit. NO. THANK. YOU.
attributes.title: Literal scum

attributes.review: this app summoned a demon in my house. it’s very hard to get out. don’t get this app unless you want a demon that steals are your dairy products. i would love to make a grilled chilled sandwich ;(
attributes.title: never again

attributes.review: I thought this app would allow me to learn more about Trump BUT INSTEAD I WAS BOMBARDED WITH ADS AND NOTIFICATIONS FORCING ME TO DONATE TO THE TRUMP CAMPAIGN! I was just here for information!
attributes.title: Aggressive FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: This app is so awesome would recommend 10/10
attributes.title: I love this app

attributes.review: This app broke my heart and chewed it up and spit it out and then, stepped on it and threw it down a sewer and called it names and then laughed😔😔
attributes.title: Heartbroken and Offended

attributes.review: All I have to say is that it was very disturbing, I do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Disturbing

attributes.review: this app downloaded three nickel back albums onto my phone without my consent. TAKE OFF THE APPLE STORE
